jaca.android.dev
Class GUIArtifact

java.lang.Object
  cartago.Artifact
      jaca.android.dev.JaCaArtifact
          jaca.android.dev.GUIArtifact
Direct Known Subclasses:
ListActivityArtifact, PreferenceGUIArtifact
public abstract class GUIArtifact
extends JaCaArtifact

Developers must extend this class to define an artifact usable from agents for observe and control Android view interface. The events related to the wrapped Activity are fetched automatically fetched by the GUIArtifact using the fetchGUIEvents() internal operation through a ActivityEventsFetcher.

#### Observable Properties #####

  • state(State). State = {"running","paused","stopped"}

Author:
mguidi
